text: læa nænxn rea di bang keid sahrab yahannam sung mak may cak yin læa mnusʹy doythi phwk khea mi hawcı sung phwk khea mi chı man thakhwam kheacı læa phwk khea mi ta sung phwk khea mi di chı man mxng læa phwk khea mi hu sung phwk khea mi chı man fang chn hela ni hæla prahnung psusatw chı tæ theanan phwk khea pen phu hlng phid ying kwa chn hela ni hæla phwk khea khux phu thi phelx rex
